# Standard crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /schedule-meeting/
Disallow: /masquer/

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://corewood.io/sitemap.xml

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /
